rooms.Name: Path leading towards Moria
rooms.Description:
You are on a path leading north, small hills surrounds you.  You feel
the forces of evil approach you from the north.

rooms.Name: The hills
rooms.Description:
You are on a small path leading north, dark threatening hills
surrounds you to almost all sides.

Exits.Description: The hills continue east. Far off in the distance, you see a snowy mountain.

rooms.Name: End of the path
rooms.Description:
The path stops here, to the north is a single mountain and around you
are some threatening hills.  There is a dark cave to the north.  You see a
large sign on the mountain.

rooms.Name: A dank, dark tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tunnel grows narrower here, and damper. You hear water dripping and the
whole area seems to smell of wet earth. You seem to hear some noise coming
from the other end of the tunnel, to the north.

rooms.Name: The dank, dark tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tunnel continues as before, but there is definitely the sound of activity
coming from the end of the tunnel, to the west. The tunnel continues back south,
or you can proceed west, where the tunnel opens into a large cave.

rooms.Name: A huge cave
rooms.Description:
The tunnel opens out into a huge cave, which has been decorated with soiled
furs and bolts of cloth, obviously stolen from caravans heading to the city.
This is the domain of the chieftain of the orcs, who does not look very
happy to see you visiting his abode...

rooms.Name: Under the hole
rooms.Description:
You have descended into an even darker portion of the caves; everything is
completely black, except what is illuminated by your light source. You
appear to be in a dead end, but you can squeeze through a narrow crack to
the west, or go back up through the hole above you.

rooms.Name: A very dark tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a tunnel that leads north and south. On the eastern wall you see
a crack that it is just possible to squeeze through. It is very dark and
quiet here, the only sounds being your own labored breathing and a few drips
of running water.

rooms.Name: A very dark tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in the northern end of a very dark underground tunnel. The tunnel
continues north and south. You hear activity from somewhere to the north.

rooms.Name: A very dark tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in the northern end of a very dark underground tunnel. All seems
quiet here, but you can hear some muffled activity to the north, where
the tunnel seems to get a bit wider. You can also continue south.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a cave, to the south you sense fresh air.  To the north a
small tunnel continues into the mountain.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You force your way through a small tunnel, to you south you sense 
a little fresh air, and to the north the tunnel continues.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a small tunnel, to the north there is a cave.  The tunnel
continues to the east.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a small tunnel leading east-west.  The floor is covered by
dust.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a tunnel, the tunnel continues to the south and to the 
west, to the north there is a cave.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in a small tunnel, the tunnel continues west.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a large cave, the cave continues east and west, to the south
you notice a small tunnel.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description: You are in the east end of the large cave.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the south end of a cave, to the south you see a tunnel.  You
notice a large pile of bones in the corner.

ExtraDescs.Description: Well you better watch out - some of the bones are human !

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel.

rooms.Name: The hole
rooms.Description: You are by a hole in the floor, you can leave down, or north.

rooms.Name: The hole
rooms.Description: You are by a hole in the floor, exits are down or east.

rooms.Name: The damp tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a damp tunnel, your clothes feel wet.  The tunnel continues
to the north, to the west you see a hole in the floor and to the east
there is a large cave.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the western part of the large cave, to the west you see
a damp tunnel.

rooms.Name: The damp tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in a damp tunnel, that leads west.

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the north end of a cave.  To the east you see some tunnels
which leads in many directions.

rooms.Name: The many tunnels
rooms.Description: You are in a tunnel, that leads of in all directions.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you also notice a tunnel to
the west.  From the north you sense the fresh air!

rooms.Name: The smelly tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you see a small light
to the north.  You notice a strange smell from the north..

rooms.Name: The cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a cave that is filled with fresh air, you sense the
wind blowing from the north.  To the south you see a small tunnel
continue into the mountain.

rooms.Name: The light cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, through a hole large above you, you see 
the sky.  A small tunnel to the south is the only way out.
You notice the source of the strange smell, all around you there is
corpses from several monsters.

rooms.Name: The valley
rooms.Description:
You are in a small valley, surrounded by hills and a mountain to 
the south.  In the mountain there is a cave.  To the north you enter
the hills.

ExtraDescs.Description: Well it doesn't look nice, but it's the only way out..

rooms.Name: The foothills
rooms.Description:
You are on a winding path that leads through the foothills on the
other side of the mountain.  The path continues north.

rooms.Name: The intersection in the foothills
rooms.Description:
The small path you are following splits here.  The path continues
north and south or you can follow a trail east into the mountains.

rooms.Name: The grassy area of the foothills
rooms.Description:
The grass here is unusually high.  You notice several areas where
someone or something large has crush spots of the down.  Several very
large rocks litter this area.  You can go north, west or south.

rooms.Name: The foothills end
rooms.Description:
At this point you are leaving the foothills.  You see a plains area
to the north of here.  You can spot a small city in the distance from
here.

rooms.Name: The plains
rooms.Description: The plains.  The only exit is south.

rooms.Name: The foothills path
rooms.Description: exits are east and west.

rooms.Name: Base of the mountain
rooms.Description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.Name: A trail up the mountain
rooms.Description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.Name: The mountain top
rooms.Description: You are on top of the mountain. Exits are north and west.

rooms.Name: The lion's den
rooms.Description:
This is definitely a den of some sort.  There are partially gnawed bones
strewn about - and some are definitely human.  Some are also definitely
fresh. You get the distinct feeling this den is still being used as such.

rooms.Name: The level foothills
rooms.Description:
You are in the level foothills. The exits are east and west, and to the
north you see a large cave with mist rising from the entrance.

rooms.Name: The cave entrance
rooms.Description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.Name: The ogre's den
rooms.Description:
This place has a certain rude splendor to it. Moth-eaten and matted furs
cover the floor, and a number of animal bones have been scattered among
them. Whoever lives here isn't very sophisticated, it seems.

rooms.Name: Before the large cavern
rooms.Description:
The dark tunnel widens out here, and as you look to the north you see that it
leads into the mouth of a very large cavern, where you hear some clinking of
chains and animal noises. There is also a side passageway to the west, or
you may continue back south.

rooms.Name: The large cavern
rooms.Description:
You are inside a large cavern. The animal noises are louder now, as is the
sound of what you believe to be chains clinking. Suddenly you hear some
deep, guttural noises that sound like language coming from the back of the
cavern. You may proceed north or east from here, or go back south through
the opening to the cavern.

rooms.Name: The large cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the southeast portion of the large cavern. You hear cursing and
animal noises to the north, as well as the clink of metal. You can also go
west from here, to another portion of the cavern.

rooms.Name: The large cavern
rooms.Description:
You are in the northwestern portion of the large cavern. The animal noises,
guttural sounds, and other sounds of activity are much louder, and appear
to be coming from the northeastern potion of the cavern. It is still too
dark to see any movement there, though. You may investigate the noises to
the east, or go back south.

rooms.Name: The Houndmaster's area
rooms.Description:
This is the northeast portion of the large cavern, and it appears to have
been given over to the purpose of maintaining a kennel for several large
canines. However, as you enter the area, you notice that there are no dogs
chained up the the cavern wall here, but several very large wargs, and the
figure in black leather cursing at them is definitely not human...

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a tunnel, which turns here.  The tunnel continues to the
east and the south.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in an east-west leading tunnel.  The tunnel is very narrow
here.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are in an east-west leading tunnel.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description: You are at a turn, the tunnel continues north and east.

rooms.Name: The light cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a large, dry cave. To the north, you a see a large open fire that
serves to light the entire cave, and to the east and west tunnels lead off.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description:
You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Only exit is west to a 
light cave.

rooms.Name: The light cave
rooms.Description:
You are in a light cave, a large fire in front of you lights the room.
The cave continues to the north and south.

ExtraDescs.Description: Well, errh - It looks somehow quite warm..!

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description:
You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads both north
and south.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads west and south.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tunnel turns here, leading to the north, where it becomes narrower and
darker. You can also go back east, the way you came.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a small tunnel, to the west the tunnel continues and 
to the east you see some light.

rooms.Name: The light cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the south end of a light cave, tunnels leads of to the
south and west.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads east and west.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads north and east.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a tunnel, only exit is west - Only exit, well there is 
also a hole in the ceiling.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description:
You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  The tunnel continues east.
To the north there is a light cave.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description:
You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads east and
north.  To the south is a large cave.

rooms.Name: The maze
rooms.Description:
You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  Exits leads west and
north.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description: You are in the northwest end of a large cave.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northeast end of a large cave.  To the north the
is a small damp tunnel.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description: You are in the southwest end of a large cave.

rooms.Name: The large cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southeast end of a large cave.  To the east you
notice a small tunnel.

rooms.Name: The tunnel
rooms.Description:
You are in a narrow tunnel, which leads both to the east and the
south.  There is also an exit towards the west, where you see a large
cave.

rooms.Name: End of tunnel
rooms.Description:
The tunnel stops here.  There is no other exits than the one you
came from.

rooms.Name: The hole
rooms.Description:
You are at a small hole in the floor, you can either leave north
or try your luck and leave down into the unknown!

rooms.Name: The light cave
rooms.Description: You are at the northern end of the lighted cave. The only exit is south.

rooms.Name: A side passageway
rooms.Description:
You are in a passageway that leads east and west. To the west, it appears to
grow wider and not quite as damp, while to the east it dead-ends in a very
dark tunnel. You think you hear metal clinking to the east, but there are
some suspicious noises to the west as well. Now would be a very good time
to decide where to go.

rooms.Name: A foul-smelling cavern
rooms.Description:
The side passageway has led you into a cavern that smells truly foul, like
nothing you have ever experienced before. The odor is almost palpable; a
mixture of blood, sweat, and wet dogs. You hear noise from the northern
end of the cavern. Squinting into the distance, you can see a passageway
leading further west, and one leading east, toward a very dark tunnel.

rooms.Name: A foul-smelling cavern
rooms.Description:
You are still in a foul-smelling cavern, which continues further north, and
you can hear noise of some sort going on there. As you continue through the
area, you hear a crack, and you realize that the floor is covered with bones,
no few of them human ones. On the heels of this thought is your observation
that the cavern also continues south, back the way you came...

rooms.Name: A gnollish torture chamber
rooms.Description:
This portion of the cavern smells even worse, and the reason for this is
quickly apparent. A number of crude, but effective torture devices have
been set up here, and one is occupied by a human woman who looks to have
died very recently. Others are stained with blood and other materials, and
the floor is positively littered with bones and gore. A number of evil-
looking gnolls are shouting at each other here, but they quickly turn
around when you enter, then grin at you and raise their weapons...

rooms.Name: A foul-smelling cavern
rooms.Description:
Continuing north into the cavern, you are forced to walk very slowly as the
bones of the floor have increased in frequency. The smell is, if anything,
growing even more intense, and you begin to wonder why you are still here
as you wipe the stinging tears away from your eyes. The cavern continues
north and south, and the activity to the north seems much closer now.

rooms.Name: The cages
rooms.Description:
This part of the cavern is given over to a number of crude but strong cages,
where prisoners are kept before being tortured. A quick glance over the
pens reveals that none of them are currently occupied, but you feel sick to
your stomach nonetheless, and get a great urge to smash something, preferably
whatever foulness is responsible for this savagery!

rooms.Name: The Master Torturer's chamber
rooms.Description:
The cavern dead-ends here, and as your eyes absorb the sight waiting for you
at the back of the foul-smelling cavern, you feel sick and horrified and
outraged all at the same time. What is obviously the gnolls' Master Torturer
is sitting here, calmly chewing on the corpse of a dead human baby. You feel
the sick certainty that it is the child of the woman who was just tortured
to death in the center of the cavern. Your stomach heaves at this vile
atrocity, and you can barely restrain yourself from killing the filthy gnoll
where he sits!

rooms.Name: A side passageway
rooms.Description:
This passageway leads east and west. To the east you see the southern end of
a cavern that smells quite foul, and to the west the passageway continues.

rooms.Name: A side passageway
rooms.Description:
You are in a side passageway leading east and west. To the west you hear a
lot of loud noises, while the eastern end of the passage is relatively quiet.
You suddenly get a whiff of something foul from the east.

rooms.Name: Entrance to the barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are at the entrance to a very large, very noisy cave. The clash of metal,
guttural grunts, and scuffling of feet fills the air here. It sounds as if
there is a battle of some sort in progress in there. The noise appears to
be coming from the north. However, you can also go east from here, and try
to remain undetected by whoever is in there.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southwestern corner of the noisy cave. The source of the noise
seems to lie somewhere to the northeast of you. There are a large number of
furred blankets lying around on the floor here. Examining them more closely,
you see that they were crudely made. Some of them are covering a number of
very disquieting bones, possibly human ones.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southern portion of the noisy cave. The source of the racket
sounds as if it lies to the northeast of your location. Looking to the east
and west, you see a large number of furs lying about the floor in disarray.
Looks as if a lot of people use this room to sleep in.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the southeastern corner of the cave. The noise is very close to
you now, probably directly to the north. You can see a number of large
humanoid forms moving around in that direction, but it is too dark to make
out any details. A bunch of furs are piled up in this end of the cave.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northeast corner of the noisy cave. You sense that the racket
is definitely coming from somewhere to the east of you. The cave floor in
this area is covered with wood ash and soot, as if someone has been tending
an open fire here recently. A number of charred bones litters the floor.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northern portion of the cave. The noise is very close now.
You think it lies directly to the east. Peering in that direction, you see
a number of very large humanoid forms moving around, and the glint of steel
catches your eye, but it is too dark to make out any details...like how
many of them there are. The northern wall of this area has a very large
boulder pushed in front of it, and as you examine it, you feel a slight
breeze, as if it is concealing a passage of some sort.

Exits.Description: A large boulder blocks passage to the north.

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
You are in the northeastern portion of the cave. This is obviously the source
of the racket you heard earlier. A bunch of gnolls appear to be sparring in
here, their weapons gleaming wickedly by your light source. As you enter the
area, they turn to face you, and it seems that they would much rather fight
with you than with each other...

rooms.Name: The barracks cave
rooms.Description:
This is a small alcove in the cave. There is a good view of the sparring
area from here, as well as a few rocks that would make fairly comfortable
places to sit. The trouble with this idea is that someone else has already
thought of it...

rooms.Name: The officers' quarters
rooms.Description:
This portion of the cave seems a lot drier and warmer than the outer part.
Although the decor is much the same, consisting largely of soiled furs,
bones, and ashes, the cave is a bit more comfortable. Apparently the people
who live here are a bit more important than the average gnolls.

Exits.Description: A large boulder blocks the passage.

rooms.Name: The officers' quarters
rooms.Description:
This cave is much like the other one, with a number of what appear to be
wolf pelts arranged on the floor to serve as a kind of bed. A large leg
bone lies on top of them, worried at by a set of extremely large teeth.
Maybe someone is trying to stop a nasty nail-biting habit. And maybe if
you're not careful, they might decide they need a new bone to chew on...
Also catching your eye is a large pile of broken rock on the north wall.
A closer examination reveals some sort of tunnel behind it, that may be
accessible, if you can shove the rocks away.

Exits.Description: The tunnel is blocked by a huge pile of broken rock.

rooms.Name: The officers' quarters
rooms.Description:
This cave is fairly similar to the other two inner caves, being a bit warmer
and drier than the one outside. This room's denizen apparently catches rats
in his spare time, for a number of them are tied to a long stake wedged into
a crack in the floor by their tails. Looking around, you see a few more of
the rats have been brained with something hard and heavy. These bodies seem
to be missing their tails altogether. Rats are very ungrateful pets.

rooms.Name: A twisty narrow passage
rooms.Description:
Pushing aside the broken rocks, you find that this tunnel is a lot narrower
than you expected it to be. Your gear bangs noisily against the cave walls
as you struggle to adjust your position. You peer around and notice that
this tunnel weaves and twists around quite a good bit, but appears to lead
north. You can also go back south, the way you came.

Exits.Description: The tunnel is blocked by a large pile of broken rock.

rooms.Name: A twisty narrow passage
rooms.Description:
Dragging yourself painfully through this tight and twisty passage, you find
that it turns to the east here, or you may go back south.

rooms.Name: A twisty narrow passage
rooms.Description:
Struggling through this tortuous passage, you grin in relief when you see
that it opens out into a cave ahead, to the east. At last! Then, you
suddenly freeze in horror when you hear a loud noise. There is something
in there, and it is moving...

rooms.Name: The gnoll chieftain's chamber
rooms.Description:
You emerge from the twisty narrow tunnel and find yourself in what passes
for an opulent lair here in Moria. This is where the chieftain of the gnolls
makes his home, and he is currently admiring some treasure brought back from
a caravan his raiders have looted. As the sound of your presence reaches him,
he turns and confronts you with a look that says you will die slowly...
